Class
Description
AcceptanceCriteria
An acceptance criteria for newly generated neighbor solution agent.
AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>
An implementation of adaptive large neighborhood search algorithm.

Repairer destroyer manager for adaptive large neighborhood search.
AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.Scores
An encapsulation of all types of scores for repairers and destroyers.
Agent
A Solution Agent for optimization.
CompletionCondition
Optimization completion condition.
Destroyer<A extends Agent,​T>
Destroyer of a valid solution agent into a partial solution.
FixedIteration
A completion condition based on total number of optimization iterations.
GreedyAcceptanceCriteria
An acceptance criteria based on greedy acceptance strategy.

An implementation of large neighborhood search optimization process.

Observer of the optimization process to capture all notifications.
OldBachelorAcceptanceCriteria
An acceptance criteria based on old bachelor principle.
OptimizationLogger<A extends Agent,​T>
A logger based observer of optimization process.
Optimizer<A extends Agent>
Optimizer based on neighborhood search.
RandomWalkAcceptanceCriteria
An acceptance criteria based on random walk principal.
Repairer<T,​A extends Agent>
Repairer of partially destroyed solution to build a valid solution agent.
SimulatedAnnealingAcceptanceCriteria
An acceptance criteria based on simulated annealing principle.
ThresholdAcceptanceCriteria
An acceptance criteria based on threshold value.
UnchangedBestFitness
A completion condition based on unchanged best fitness value for predefined number of generations.
